sourcesContent: import React from 'react' class App extends React.Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { firstName: "", lastName: "", isEvil: false, gender: "", favFood: "Udon" } this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this) } handleChange(event) { const {name, value, type, checked} = event.target type === "checkbox" ? this.setState({ [name]: checked }) : this.setState({ [name]: value }) } render() { return (
